Sentencas: This work presents the exergoeconomic analysis and assessment of a recently developed integrated system for the multigeneration of electrical power, space heating, freshwater, and ammonium bicarbonate.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: The last chemical commodity is used as a method of carbon capturing and utilization method.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: This type of analysis is important because it shows the economic feasibility of integrated systems for power production with carbon capture and utilization features.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: This helps attract the power industry decarbonize in an economic way.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: The integrated system is modeled using the energy, exergy, and then the exergoeconomic analysis tools for investigating this system in terms of its thermodynamic and economic performance.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: Furthermore, the integrated system is studied using a multi-objective optimization method to find the Pareto front where the overall exergy destruction rate and the overall unit cost of product are mutually minimized.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: The results of this study show that the ammonium bicarbonate is produced with a cost rate of 2.02 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: $ s(-1), and the overall unit cost of product is 2.38 x 10(-3) $ kJ(-1).
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: The overall exergy destruction cost rate and the overall exergoeconomic factor are evaluated to be 0.79 $ s(-1), and 2.97%, respectively.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: Moreover, the multi-objective optimization study has produced an optimum point where has an overall exergy destruction rate of 1.62 x 10(4) kW and an overall unit cost of product of 2.42 x 10(3) $ kJ(-1).
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing

Sentencas: The cost of producing ammonium bicarbonate is only 16% of the market price for this chemical commodity which indicates an economic feasibility of this carbon capturing and utilization system.
Titulo: Development and optimization of a multigeneration geothermal and solid-oxide fuel cell-based integrated system with carbon capturing
